data.title: Leadership
data.meta_description: CIMâs senior management team is comprised of principals and managing directors. Click here to learn more about our leadership.
data.text:
Bradley Aaronson

Managing Director, Development

Bradley Aaronson is a Managing Director in the Development Group. He is responsible for overseeing strategic initiatives and multiple development projects. Notable projects that Mr. Aaronson has participated in include Sunset La Cienega and The Lot in West Hollywood, The Dolby Theatre in Hollywood; Tribune Tower in Chicago; and Downtown Grand Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas. Mr. Aaronson began his career at CIM in 2006 as an Analyst in the Investments Group. He earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in Urban Studies from Stanford University.

Steve Berg

Principal, Corporate Development and Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A)

Steve Berg is a Principal in the Finance Group. He oversees CIMâs corporate accounting and cost allocation processes, as well as corporate development and planning. Prior to joining CIM, Mr. Berg was with Standish Management. He began his career in the San Francisco and Los Angeles offices of PricewaterhouseCoopers, LLP. Mr. Berg received a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Administration with concentrations in Accounting and Finance from California Polytechnic State University, San Luis Obispo. He is also a Certified Public Accountant (CPA) inactive and holds the Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) designation.

Barry Berlin

Managing Director, Finance

Barry Berlin serves as a Managing Director in the Finance Group at CIM Group and is the Chief Financial Officer of CIM Capital, LLC, a Registered Investment Advisor. He is also the Chief Financial Officer of both Creative Media & Community Trust Corporation (CMCT) and CIM Real Assets and Credit Fund (CIM RACR) . Mr. Berlin has served in various finance and accounting roles within CIM Group and its affiliates since 2017. He began his career at Laventhol and Horwath and continued as an audit manager at Imber and Company, Certified Public Accountants. He earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Accounting from the University of Florida and is a Certified Public Accountant (CPA).

Jeff Columbus

Principal, Development

âWe are helping to enhance urban communities by building seamless sustainable solutions that invigorate neighborhoods and serve the needs and wants of communities.â Jeff Columbus is a Principal in the Development Group. He is actively involved in development management and sales brokerage across CIMâs platforms and serves on CIMâs Investment Committee. Prior to joining CIM in 2003, Mr. Columbus served in various capacities at the Hapsmith Company. He earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Finance and Real Estate from California State University, Northridge.

Nate DeBacker

Managing Director, Fund Accounting and Reporting

Nate DeBacker is a Managing Director in the Fund Accounting and Reporting Group and the Chief Financial Officer of CMFT. He is actively involved in the overall management of accounting, external reporting, financial planning, analysis and treasury for CIMâs public and private funds. Prior to joining CIM, Mr. DeBacker was Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer for Cole Capital. Mr. DeBacker earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Accounting from the University of Arizona and is a Certified Public Accountant in Arizona.

Jordan Dembo

Principal, Chief Legal Officer

"The most rewarding part of my position at CIM is providing counsel on wide-ranging matters and legal issues, all while helping us accomplish our goal of maximizing value." Jordan Dembo is a Principal and Chief Legal Officer. Mr. Dembo works to identify and mitigate risk across the organization, while protecting CIM and its assets by providing general advice on other legal matters. Prior to joining CIM in 2011, Mr. Dembo was a Senior Associate in the Real Estate Department at Katten Muchin Rosenman. He earned a Bachelor of Business Administration degree in Real Estate from the University of Wisconsin-Madison and a Juris Doctor degree from the University of California, Los Angeles.

Jay Fischer

Managing Director, Investments

Jay Fischer is a Managing Director in the Investments Group. He is responsible for leading the acquisition, management, and disposition of assets across several U.S. submarkets. Prior to joining CIM, Mr. Fischer served as Managing Director and Head of U.S. Office Investments, Real Estate Investments at Canada Pension Plan Investment Board (CPPIB). He also worked at Rockwood Capital originating new investments and asset managing existing investments through disposition. Mr. Fischer earned a Bachelor of Science degree from the School of Hotel Administration at Cornell University. He also earned a Master of Business Administration from The Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania.

Jason Fisher

Managing Director, Institutional Client Group

Jason Fisher, Managing Director, is the Head of CIMâs Institutional Client Group. He is responsible for leading CIMâs global distribution team in institutional capital raising efforts worldwide. Prior to joining CIM, Mr. Fisher was a Managing Director at BlackRock, where he led the Mid Institutional business in the Americas. Previous to that, Mr. Fisher was a Managing Director at PineBridge Investments, where he led Global Consultant Relations and the U.S. Taft Hartley & Middle Market businesses. Mr. Fisher started his career at J.P. Morgan Asset Management, where he more recently held a number of senior positions in Institutional Americas. Mr. Fisher received a Bachelor of Business Administration in Marketing from The George Washington University, where he currently serves on the Board of Advisors for the School of Business.

Jennifer Gandin

Principal, Investments

Jennifer Gandin is a Principal in the Investments Group. She is actively involved in the investment management process across CIMâs platforms and serves on CIMâs Investment Committee. Additionally, Ms. Gandin represents CIM on the boards of SkyPower Global and Ecoppia (TASE: ECPA). Prior to joining CIM in 2003, Ms. Gandin worked in acquisitions for the private equity firm Gores Technology Group and served in roles at various other private equity and investment firms. Ms. Gandin earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Administration from the University of California, Berkeley and a Master of Business Administration degree from Columbia Business School.

Shaul Kuba

Co-Founder and Principal

Shaul Kuba is a Co-Founder and Principal of CIM and Chief Investment Officer of Creative Media & Community Trust Corporation (CMCT). Mr. Kuba has more than 25 years of active real estate, infrastructure and lending experience. Since co-founding CIM in 1994, Mr. Kuba has been an integral part of building the firmâs real estate, infrastructure and debt platforms. As the head of the development team, he is actively involved in the development, redevelopment and repositioning of CIMâs real estate assets. He also serves on CIMâs Investment Committee. Additionally, Mr. Kuba is instrumental in sourcing new opportunities and establishing and maintaining relationships with national and regional retailers, hospitality brands and restaurateurs.

Naoki Kurita

Managing Director, Partner & Co-Investor Relations Group

Naoki Kurita is a Managing Director in the Partner & Co-Investor Relations Group and a member of CIMâs Investment Committee. He is responsible for promoting the distribution of CIMâs investment programs to Japanese investors. Prior to joining CIM, Mr. Kurita held various roles with Mitsui & Co., Ltd where he worked in asset management, insurance and logistics. He earned a Bachelor of Economics from Kobe University and a Master of Business Administration from The Wharton School of Business at the University of Pennsylvania.

Nick Morosoff

Principal, Counsel

"Weâre never standing still. Weâre always evolving, looking at different communities, different asset classes, different investment structures. We know the best opportunities arenât cookie-cutter, theyâre ones that require molding and innovation, and thatâs what we provide." Nick Morosoff is a Principal Counsel. As a Principal, Mr. Morosoff is actively involved in CIMâs legal processes and serves on CIMâs Investment Committee. Prior to joining CIM in 1998, he was the General Counsel of Orchard Capital Corporation, an Assistant U.S. Attorney for the Department of Justice in Los Angeles and an Associate with Sullivan & Cromwell. Mr. Morosoff earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in Economics and a Juris Doctor degree from Boston University.

Daniel Ottensoser

Managing Director, Portfolio Oversight

Daniel Ottensoser is a Managing Director in the Portfolio Oversight Group. He is responsible for overseeing portfolio construction and asset allocation for CIM Real Estate Finance Trust, Inc. (CMFT) including originating and acquiring mortgage and mezzanine loans on real estate assets, single-tenant credit lease assets, broadly syndicated corporate loans, CMBS securities and structured credit. Prior to joining CIM, Mr. Ottensoser was a Partner and Managing Director at H/2 Capital Partners. He earned a Bachelor of Arts degree from The City University of New York, Queens College and a Juris Doctor degree from the Columbia University School of Law.

John Perez

Managing Director, Government Affairs

John Perez is a Managing Director in the Government Affairs Group. He is responsible for CIMâs union relations and legislative and administrative advocacy initiatives. Mr. Perezâs extensive legislative and political experience includes serving in the California State Assembly with five years as the 68th Assembly Speaker. He was also a political director for the United Food & Commercial Workers Union Local 324, California Labor Federation, AFL-CIO and United Food & Commercial Workers State Council. Most recently, he provided strategic consulting services on complex public affairs and legislative matters as Double Nickel Advisors, LLC, which he founded in 2014. Mr. Perez currently serves as a member of the University of California Board of Regents.

Richard Ressler

Co-Founder and Principal

Richard Ressler is a Co-Founder and Principal of CIM Group with more than 30 years of active real estate, infrastructure and lending experience. Since co-founding CIM in 1994, Mr. Ressler has been a fundamental influence in shaping the organization and facilitating its growth. He is the chair of CIMâs Executive, Investment, Allocation and Real Asset Management Committees. He leads several teams essential to internal and external operations at CIM. Prior to co-founding CIM Mr. Ressler founded Orchard Capital Corp. and continues to oversee companies in which Orchard Capital or its affiliates invest, including CIM, Orchard First Source Asset Management Holdings, LLC, a full-service provider of capital and leveraged finance solutions to U.S. corporations, and OCV Management, LLC, an investor, owner and operator of technology companies. Further, he currently serves as a board member for various public and private entities, including as, Chairman of the Board, CEO and President of CIM Real Estate Finance Trust, Inc., Chairman of the Board of Directors for Creative Media & Community Trust (NASDAQ âCMCTâ), and serves on the Board of Directors for Presbia US Inc. Additionally, Mr. Ressler has served as Chairman of the Board of Ziff Davis, and as Vice Chairman and in various executive capacities of Brooke Group Limited. Prior to Brooke Group, he worked as an investment banker at Drexel Burnham Lambert, Inc. and as an attorney at Cravath, Swaine and Moore. Mr. Ressler earned a Bachelor of Arts degree from Brown University and Juris Doctor and Master of Business Administration degrees from Columbia University.

Daniel Schapiro

Managing Director, Investments

Daniel Schapiro is a Managing Director in the Investments Group. He serves as the Credit Originations Director of the CIM Real Estate Debt Solutions platform and is responsible for leading CIMâs real estate loan origination efforts across all U.S. markets. Mr. Schapiro has extensive experience in real estate finance, investment management, real estate private equity and investment banking. Prior to joining CIM, he worked as a Director at Deutsche Bank. He has also worked as Partner and Vice President at H/2 Capital Partners. Mr. Schapiro earned a Bachelor of Science in Political Science from Tulane University.

Jason Schreiber

Principal, Investments

Jason Schreiber is a Principal in the Investments Group. He is actively involved in the investment management process across CIMâs platforms and serves on CIMâs Investment Committee. Additionally, Mr. Schreiber serves on the boards of CIM Real Estate Finance Trust, Inc. (CMFT) and CCLA Holdings. Prior to joining CIM in 2007, Mr. Schreiber was an Analyst in the Tech, Media and Telecom investment banking group at Goldman Sachs. Mr. Schreiber earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in Economics and History of Art from Brown University and a Master of Business Administration degree from Harvard Business School.

Avi Shemesh

Co-Founder and Principal

Avi Shemesh is a Co-Founder and Principal of CIM GroupÂ® with more than 25 years of active real estate, infrastructure and lending experience. Since co-founding CIM in 1994, Mr. Shemesh has been instrumental in building the firmâs real estate, infrastructure and debt platforms. He serves on CIMâs Investment and Real Asset Management Committees, providing guidance on the diverse opportunities available across CIMâs various platforms. Mr. Shemesh is responsible for CIMâs long-time relationships with strategic institutions and oversees teams essential to acquisitions, portfolio management and internal and external communication. Prior to CIM, Mr. Shemesh was involved in several entrepreneurial real estate endeavors, including co-founding Dekel Development, a developer of commercial and multifamily properties in Los Angeles.

Jolly Singh

Principal, Portfolio Oversight

Jolly Singh is a Principal in the Portfolio Oversight Group. He is actively involved in the composition, operations and investment priorities for CIMâs open-end core real estate fund and serves on the Investment Committee. Prior to joining CIM, Mr. Singh was an Associate in the Real Estate, Gaming & Lodging investment banking group of Bank of America Merrill Lynch. He earned Bachelor of Science degrees in Business Administration and Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, and a Master of Business Administration degree with an emphasis in Finance and Real Estate from the University of California, Berkeley.

David Thompson

Principal and Chief Financial Officer

David Thompson is a Principal and Chief Financial Officer at CIM Group and the Chief Executive Officer of CMCT. He is responsible for overseeing all areas of Finance within CIM and serves on the Investment Committee. Prior to joining CIM in 2009, Mr. Thompson spent 15 years with Hilton Hotels Corporation, most recently as Senior Vice President and Controller. Mr. Thompsonâs experience includes multi-billion-dollar real estate acquisitions and dispositions in the office, retail, multifamily, hospitality, gaming and timeshare sectors, as well as significant capital markets experience. He began his career as a CPA at Arthur Andersen & Co.

Emily Vande Krol

Principal, Global Client Group

Emily Vande Krol is a Principal at CIM Group and President of CCO Capital, LLC, CIMâs registered broker-dealer. In this position, she leads the Global Client Group, which includes all capital raise activities, fund operations and strategic marketing. These teams are responsible for building relationships and supporting CIMâs partners and co-investors across all distribution channels. Ms. Vande Krol guides the strategic growth and collaboration of the CIM distribution team, creating and aligning capital raise efforts alongside Portfolio Oversight, Strategy Solutions and Capital Markets. Prior to overseeing all distribution efforts, Ms. Vande Krol served in various capacities building CIMâs Private Wealth channel and Fund Operations infrastructure. She also held positions at VEREIT, Cole Capital and Thrivent Financial. She earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Accounting from Arizona State University. She holds FINRA Series 7 and 24 licenses.

Shaul Kuba

Co-Founder and Principal

Shaul Kuba is a Co-Founder and Principal of CIM and Chief Investment Officer of Creative Media & Community Trust Corporation (CMCT). Mr. Kuba has more than 25 years of active real estate, infrastructure and lending experience. Since co-founding CIM in 1994, Mr. Kuba has been an integral part of building the firmâs real estate, infrastructure and debt platforms. As the head of the development team, he is actively involved in the development, redevelopment and repositioning of CIMâs real estate assets. He also serves on CIMâs Investment Committee. Additionally, Mr. Kuba is instrumental in sourcing new opportunities and establishing and maintaining relationships with national and regional retailers, hospitality brands and restaurateurs.

Mr. Ressler earned a Bachelor of Arts degree from Brown University and Juris Doctor and Master of Business Administration degrees from Columbia University.

Co-Founder and Principal

Avi Shemesh is a Co-Founder and Principal of CIM GroupÂ® with more than 25 years of active real estate, infrastructure and lending experience. Bruce Lowrey

Managing Director, Investments

Bruce Lowrey is a Managing Director in the Investments Group. He is responsible for providing financing solutions to experienced hotel owners and operators across the U.S. Prior to joining CIM, he served as the Chief Lending Officer for Access Point Financial. He also worked as Managing Director of credit strategies at Rockbridge Capital. Mr. Lowrey earned a Bachelor of Arts in Economics from Denison University.

Daniel Ottensoser

Managing Director, Portfolio Oversight

Managing Director, Government Affairs

Qilan Tang

Managing Director, Portfolio Oversight

Qilan Tang is a Managing Director in the Portfolio Oversight Group, where she leads portfolio oversight for CIMâs infrastructure investment strategies to help drive financial and environmental, social, and corporate governance (ESG) performance. Prior to joining CIM, Ms. Tang worked in investment banking at Credit Suisse, where she focused on capital market transactions of financial institutions based in North America. Her experience also includes portfolio management for leading hedge funds and a proprietary trading platform. Ms. Tang earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in Economics from Yale University.

Joe Terry

Managing Director, Chief Compliance Officer

Joe Terry is the Chief Compliance Officer for CIM's affiliated broker/dealer, CCO Capital, and leads CIMâs distribution compliance program. He oversees a team that supports the growth of CIMâs sales organization while maintaining a strong culture of compliance. Prior to joining CIM, Mr. Terry held positions at LPL, John Hancock, and Advisor Group. He earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in Economics from Westminster College, and a Master of Business Administration and a Master of Science degree from the Kelley School of Business at Indiana University.
